channel.title: Oc on Everyday Linux
channel.description: Recent content in Oc on Everyday Linux

item.title: oc Tips
item.description: OC Command Tips $ oc login -u system:admin $ oc whoami --config=$HOME/.kube/config Show all resources…​ and I mean ALL: $ kubectl api-resources --verbs=list --namespaced -o name | xargs -n 1 kubectl get --show-kind --ignore-not-found -n openshift-monitoring
